sources.title: Dancers in the Dark
sources.description: “Sexy Paramount pre-code” “She’s got the dime-a-dance blues” “Can’t get enough of Miriam” (IMDB reviews quotes). Miriam Hopkins the center of attention in this love triangle at a taxi dance club. Jack Okie appears in a straight dramatic role and George Raft is the house gangster. Good supporting cast and good production values. IMDB rating 6.2. Directed by David Burton. Released in 1932. Complete print.
